I've got a question...

People say that even SKIDROW's crackfix repack has problems, can anyone confirm/deny that?

Please mention the difficulty you played at and if you started the game from the beginning after applying the crackfix repack.

I played the game in normal difficult with the repacked crack, and no problems. I play the first half of the game with the first crack, and it had bugs. Then I aplied the repacked crack, I finish the game in easy difficulty, ant after I finish the game in normal difficult again and no problems. So... the crack is OK and it hasn`t any bugs. :) ;)

oK..Most of you are experts on doing this, but for me is the first time I've ever dowloaded a game. I have no idea on how to install it...could someone help or send me a link where I can find explanations on how to install this. Thanks

@ Prima-donna

Man its sooo easy .

1.Download this game.
2.go to downloaded files and mount the .ISO using Poweriso or demont tool program 
3.Install the game .
4. Apply the crack (copy all files in Skidrow file to game Dir)
5. Enjoy :)

Note :

Power Iso And Daemont tools create a vritual DVD drive which is used to mount image Cd files such as .ISO just right click on the cd image and mount it to a drive after that the image runs like a normal DVD or CD in mu computer .

@ Prima-donna
For me i didnt use this Rip i used clone DVD which is larger around 5.6 GB  if you want to download it with crack ,use this link:


http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5649029/Prince_of_Persia_The_Forgotten_Sands-SKIDROW

It"s working 100%

1. When download complete, select any one of the rar file from 18 . extract it where u want.

2. in extracted files run setup

3. When setup complete. open folder fix & run setup.

4. after that open folder crack & copy all the files & paste to your game directory where u install this game.

5.run the game enjoy.
